about_the_game:
The Amen Break Roguelite

Step into a vibrant world where the pulse of the Amen Break is your ultimate tool and the beat is your guide. In *The Amen Variations* where every bullet is a beat, you’ll blast your way through a kaleidoscope of abstract enemies threatening the cores of creation. Armed with your Amen Break gun, every shot you fire shapes the music, creating a dynamic and playful symphony that echoes the raw energy of jungle and breakbeat culture.

A Musical Shooter and a Tower Defense game

But the fun doesn’t stop there—jump into musical tower defense, where every tower is a realtime generated instrument, every pulse is a bullet, and every win is a track waiting to be spun. Strategize your groove, lay down the beats, and watch as your musical defenses turn the chaos into a harmonious jam session.

Jam Session

When you’re ready to freestyle, enter the Free Party mode, where creativity knows no bounds. Craft your own tracks in real-time, mixing and mashing sonic items as you please. Whether you're a seasoned junglist or a newbie to electronic music, *The Amen Variations* invites you to explore the playful side of rhythm-based fun, where the only goal is to keep the beat alive and the vibes high.

Join the realtime non linear music revolution and become part of the sonic playground. Can you keep the groove going? The game is your canvas, and the sound is your playground!
